Today was the first Track practice of the year. There was a meeting yesterday where the coaches told us what we would need to bring for practice each day. Looking around the room, I saw a lot of the popular athletes standing in their cliches.

Can't forget the state winning thrower, Julien. Julien is a short, stocky guy. Being Dutch, he’s got creamy tan colored skin and a light accent. Years of working out has made his body toned. He’s got impressive features, but his most viewed at is what he is packing in back. He’s got a giant bubble butt that seems to strain every kind of pants he wears.

Even the coaches were studs back in their day.
You, on the other hand, are not an athlete at all. Both your parents were stars in their prime, but you weren’t lucky enough to gain that trait. You are only doing track because your parents wanted you to do a sport. Seeing all theses star athletes broke your confidence a little bit, but you still decided to try. And here you are, walking with your bag over to the rubber track. It’s black surface reflecting brightly due to the intense sunlight. This was always the hottest part of the day.
Taking a look around, you notice that only a few people were at the track, just a handful of coaches and students getting ready. You set your bag down and take a deep breath. Here we go.

info.description:
Gift Points will be given for chapters added

It’s that time of the year when Track season rolls around! Unlucky for you when a turn of events leads to you shrinking with all these giant athletes! What’s going to happen?

Rules:
Absolutely no interactions with female characters.

The main character can't be killed.

Try not to end a story line right away, keep it going.

No few word entries! Try to write out at least a paragraph and use spellcheck. If not, the entry will be deleted.
